```{r readcsv, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

goodreads <- read_csv("/cloud/project/books.csv")
goodreads <- goodreads[complete.cases(goodreads),]

view(goodreads)  
print(goodreads)
```

```{r, count}
goodreads %>%
  count(authors)%>%
  arrange(desc(n))

goodreads %>%
  count(publisher)%>%
  arrange(desc(n))

goodreads %>%
  count(language_code)%>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```


```{r, english}
books_eng <- goodreads %>%
  filter(language_code == c("eng", "en-US", "en-GB", "en-CA"))

print(books_eng)

```


```{r}
books_eng %>%
  filter(authors %like% "J.K. Rowling")
```
